Business Development Specialist Job at Brenhazy Limited




        
    

        
        Brenhazy Limited is a privately owned Nigerian company incorporated in 2014 to provide Manpower Services, Engineering, Procurement, and Construction (EPC) services to companies in line with standard requirements and global best practices.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Development Specialist

Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are looking for a dynamic Business Development Specialist with proven success in leading, networking, and implementing key business development priorities.


Job Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Must be able to bring Clients for the Manpower arm of the organization.
	Drive product feature enhancements and service platform optimization to deliver long-term value-add for the value chain of different verticals in the Power and Renewable Energy space.
	Grow existing market share, develop, and penetrate new markets/segments through value offerings.
	Develop new business ideas, grow transaction volume, and develop market expansion strategies.
	Identify, research, develop, implement, deploy, and manage new business initiatives across all market types to optimize channel usage and business value.
	Acquire strategic partnerships that enable access to market and big aggregators relevant to the business objectives and would contribute to business value both short term and long term.
	Build a relevant knowledge base that demonstrates an apt understanding of the corporate landscape needs and ensures a full understanding of the business risks, the right model, and processes that mitigate such risks.


Educational / Professional Requirements
Qualification:


	Good First Degree and preferably a Master's degree.


Work experience:


	Minimum of 5 - 6 years of cognate experience of which must have been in team lead roles. In-depth knowledge of upcoming and ongoing key projects in the upstream & downstream sectors of Construction.
	Candidate must have experience in Oil and Gas, Engineering, Procurement, Construction and Manpower (Human Resources, HR) services.
	An eye for fashioning out business opportunities and supporting business growth. A thoughtful leader in maximizing business opportunities.


Competence Requirements:


	Proven experience in Oil & Gas and EPC
	Excellent relationship management skills.
	Proven ability to advise and convince clients
	Excellent written, presentation, and oral communication skills.
	Proven experience working with minimum supervision
	Excellent intelligence-gathering skills.
	Excellent mentoring and people management skills.
	A team player Job Dimensions.


Other Requirements:


	Candidate must have experience in Oil and Gas, Engineering, Procurement, Construction and Manpower (Human Resources, HR) services.
	Candidates must reside in Port Harcourt.


Remuneration
N400,000 - N600,000 / month.

Method  of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: recruitment@brenhazy.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Business Development and Operations Manager Job at Inked Memory.io




        
    

        
        At Inked Memory.io, we believe every life is a masterpiece, every story a treasure. Our purpose is to help families captureand preserve meaningful memories with beautifully crafted journals that inspire reflection and connection across generations. Through our thoughtfully designed products, we transform fleeting moments into timeless keepsakes that honor the people who shape our lives.

Our memory journals are more than just books—they’re bridges that connect generations, celebrating love, resilience, and the human experience.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Development and Operations Manager

Job Location: Lagos
     

            
    



Key Responsibilities


	Develop and execute sales strategies to achieve and exceed revenue targets.
	Identify new business opportunities, partnerships, and markets to expand Inked Memory’s reach.
	Build and maintain strong client relationships to ensure repeat business and referrals.
	Prepare and present proposals, pitches, and sales reports to management.
	Work with the creative team to ensure consistent branding across all channels.
	Lead, motivate, and support sales/marketing team members to achieve departmental goals.
	Coordinate with cross-functional teams (content, design, operations) to deliver on marketing initiatives.
	Create and manage integrated marketing campaigns to promote products, services, and brand awareness.
	Oversee digital marketing efforts, including social media, SEO, content marketing, email campaigns, and paid advertising.
	Analyze market trends and competitors to adapt strategies for better positioning.
	Manage marketing budget effectively and optimize for ROI.
	Track KPIs and provide regular reports onlead generationand sales performance.
	Use analytics and market insights to refine sales and marketing approaches.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business Administration, Communications, or a related field.
	3 - 6 years of proven experience in sales and marketing, preferably in a creative or consumer-driven industry.
	Strong understanding of digital marketing, branding, and customer acquisition strategies.
	Excellent communication, negotiation, and presentation skills.
	Proven track record of achieving sales targets and growing market presence.
	Ability to lead a team and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
